name: Trouble On The Road
description:
Trouble on the road is a game i made in one day, originally being meant for the global game jam 2020 with the theme ''repair'', but released independently due to my inability to officially join.

Your car is busted right in the middle of nowhere, so you venture out further onto the road to find parts to fix it, but you're not alone...

#indie #horror #adventure #arcade #survival #other
